Actions.Text: set theInstance to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set theSource to getvariable "localSource" instance theInstance	set theResult to ""	repeat with i from 1 to length of theSource		set currentChar to character i of theSource				if currentChar is "n" then			set theResult to theResult & "0"		else if currentChar is "e" then			set theResult to theResult & ""		else if currentChar is "m" then			set theResult to theResult & "1"		else if currentChar is "," then			set theResult to theResult & "2"		else if currentChar is "." then			set theResult to theResult & "3"		else if currentChar is "h" then			set theResult to theResult & "."		else if currentChar is "j" then			set theResult to theResult & "4"		else if currentChar is "k" then			set theResult to theResult & "5"		else if currentChar is "l" then			set theResult to theResult & "6"		else if currentChar is "u" then			set theResult to theResult & "7"		else if currentChar is "i" then			set theResult to theResult & "8"		else if currentChar is "o" then			set theResult to theResult & "9"		else if currentChar is ";" then			set theResult to theResult & "-"		else			set theResult to theResult & currentChar		end if	end repeat		set the clipboard to theResultend tell-- Simulate Cmd+V to paste the resulttell application "System Events"	keystroke "v" using command downend tell
